thread.title: 11 Alternative Necklaces to Buy Now Before Kendall Jenner Makes Them Ubiquitous
thread.title_full: 11 Alternative Necklaces to Buy Now Before Kendall Jenner Makes Them Ubiquitous

author: Brooke Bobb, Jorden Bickham
title: 11 Alternative Necklaces to Buy Now Before Kendall Jenner Makes Them Ubiquitous
text:
Vogue may earn compensation on these sales through affiliate programs. See more photos of: Photographed by David Sims, Vogue , January 2015 See more photos of: Expand Jennifer Meyer good luck charm rose gold and diamond necklace, $3,950, ylang23.com ; Foundrae diamond dream pendant necklace, $4,775, ylang23.com Photo: (Clockwise from top left) Courtesy of ylang23.com (2) See more photos of: Expand Gucci velvet necklace with glass pearls, $1,670, gucci.com ; Givenchy silver-tone crystal necklace, $860, net-a-porter.com ; David Yurman Osetra pendant necklace with green onyx, $1,600, davidyurman.com Photo: (Clockwise from top left) Courtesy of gucci.com; Courtesy of net-a-porter.com; Courtesy of davidyurman.com See more photos of: Larkspur & Hawk blue bella three-strand rivière necklace, $6,700, lyst.com Photo: Courtesy of lyst.com See more photos of: Expand Sophie Buhai egg pendant necklace, $650, modaoperandi.com ; Tiffany & Co. Elsa Peretti open bottle pendant, $850, tiffany.com Photo: (Clockwise from top left) Courtesy of modaoperandi.com; Courtesy of tiffany.com See more photos of: Expand Céline toy dolphin necklace, price upon request, for information: celine.com ; Kate Spade New York wild imagination gold-tone pig locket necklace, $128, macys.com Photo: (Clockwise from top left) Courtesy of celine.com; Courtesy of Macys See more photos of: Monies disc pendant, $180, farfetch.com Photo: Courtesy of farfetch.com See more photos of: 
You’d be hard-pressed to scroll through Kendall Jenner’s Instagram account and find any photo of her not wearing a choker. Diamanté or dark velvet, this piece of jewelry has become the model’s signature accessory, inspiring millions of It-girl loyalists and, most recently, a cheeky Matt Lauer to mimic the look. And yet, as the inevitable ebb and flow of fashion trends go, the choker craze may be waning in 2017. Like the street style frenzy for creeper shoes and bomber jackets that came before, it’s time to consider hanging up those little black ribbons and try on a new kind of necklace this year. 
Pretty pendants, long chains, and multi-strand statement pieces are poised to take the lead, so better jump on board and shop the 10 alternative choices above, before Ms. Jenner snaps a stylish selfie with one.
